messages.title: Caroline Lucas strongly ahead in Brighton
messages.content: A recent ICM poll shows Caroline Lucas to be the clear General Election leader in Brighton Pavilion, up 5% over the 2015 election. It also shows the Tories replacing Labour to take second place, up 2%. With polls and the recent council elections confirming the Tories' clear national lead, Caroline is the only candidate who can keep Theresa May's Conservatives out of the heart of Brighton.

leaflet.personalStatement: Stand up for Brighton. Stand up for what matters. Vote Green and re-elect Caroline Lucas on 8 June

contactInformation.address: Caroline Lucas, both 39-41 Surrey Street, Brighton BN1 3PB

images.caption: RE-ELECT CAROLINE LUCAS STANDING UP FOR YOU

leaflet.additionalNotes: Cover photo by: Sarah West, Printed on paper sourced from responsibly managed forests, certified in accordance with the FSC (Forest Stewardship Council)
